attributes.action: Make the Priminister,all M.Ps and all the lords use the national health service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I cant help but think that the national health service would be completely different if they had to use the same health service as the rest of us mere mortals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
